REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0777 reute d f BC-<MICROTEL-INC>-MAKES 03-23 0069

TEXT.TITLE: <MICROTEL INC> MAKES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Microtel Inc said it has completed the acquisition of <American Teledata Corp> and its US Dial subsidiary, which provide long distance telephone service in northeast Florida. Terms were not disclosed. Microtel's shareholders include Norfolk Southern Corp <NSC>, M/A-Com Inc <MAI>, Centel Corp <CNT>, Alltel Corp <AT> and E.F. Hutton Group Inc <EFH>. Reuter
